abstract: Parameters that affect the process of training an object detection model.
overview:

You can explicitly set values for [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLObjectDetector/ModelParameters-swift.struct/maxIterations] and [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLObjectDetector/ModelParameters-swift.struct/batchSize]. You can also explicitly define the validation dataset to override the default behavior, which uses a random selection of your training dataset for validation.

# MLObjectDetector.ModelParameters

**Structure**

Parameters that affect the process of training an object detection model.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ModelParameters
```

## Overview

Customize the training process of an object detector by creating an [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLObjectDetector/ModelParameters-swift.struct] instance and passing it to an object detector’s initializer. You can explicitly set values for [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLObjectDetector/ModelParameters-swift.struct/maxIterations] and [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLObjectDetector/ModelParameters-swift.struct/batchSize]. You can also explicitly define the validation dataset to override the default behavior, which uses a random selection of your training dataset for validation.

## Creating object detector parameters

- **init(validation:batchSize:maxIterations:)**: Creates a model parameters instance for an object-detector training session set to use the full network algorithm.
- **init(validation:batchSize:maxIterations:gridSize:algorithm:)**: Creates a model parameters instance for an object-detector training session.
- **init(validationData:batchSize:maxIterations:)**: Creates a model parameters instance for an object-detector training session set to use the full network algorithm.

## Accessing the training parameters

- **validation**: The object detector’s validation dataset for the training session.
- **batchSize**: The number of images the training session can use in a training iteration.
- **maxIterations**: The maximum number of iterations the training session can use.
- **algorithm**: The algorithm the training session uses to train the object detector.
- **gridSize**: The number of rectangles, vertically and horizontally, the training algorithm uses to analyze each input image.

## Describing the model parameters

- **description**: A text representation of the model parameters.
- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the model parameters that’s suitable for output during debugging.
- **playgroundDescription**: A description of the model parameters within a playground.

## Supporting types

- **MLObjectDetector.ModelParameters.ValidationData**: A validation dataset for an object detector.
- **MLObjectDetector.ModelParameters.ModelAlgorithmType**: An object-detector training algorithm.
- **MLObjectDetector.ModelParameters.FeatureExtractorType**: The underlying base model that extracts image features for an object-detector training session.

## Default Implementations

- **CustomDebugStringConvertible Implementations**
- **CustomPlaygroundDisplayConvertible Implementations**
- **CustomStringConvertible Implementations**

## Supporting types

- **MLObjectDetector.DataSource**: A data source for an object detector.
- **MLObjectDetector.AnnotationType**: The available types of image annotations.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomPlaygroundDisplayConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
